text.value: Preview Markdown using custom style sheets, update below two variables to try out other styles.

html.value:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <style>
  @media (prefers-color-scheme: light) {
    $
  }
  @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {
    $
  }
  </style>
</head>
<body style='font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol";'>
  $
</body>
</html>
